title: Job Vacancies at Chutel Technology
content:
Chutel Technology is into sales of all kinds of phone accessories, Mobile Screens, Home Services and Repairs, Wholesales and Retails.

We are currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Representative

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Requirements
     

            
    




	B.Sc., HND, or OND in any related field A proactive problem-solver with the ability to multitask effectively Preferably a minimum of 1-3 years leadership experience in a supermarket with leadership and supervisory experience will be an added advantage.
	Strong organizational and leadership skills Experience in managing inventory, logistics, and daily operations
	Able to work independently with little or no supervision
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Passion for efficiency, structure, and continuous improvement
	Keen attention to detail


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: chuteltechnology@gmail.com with the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Cashier

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Requirements


	BSC,HND in any related studies
	Preferably minimum of 1-3 years of working experience in a supermarket with leadership and supervisory experience will be an added advantage,
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with strong organizational and multitasking skills
	Proficient with the usage of the system, someone who is IT savvy and can solve IT related problems.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: chuteltechnology@gmail.com with the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Internal Control Supervisor

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Requirements


	B.Sc., HND, or OND in any related field.
	A proactive problem-solver with the ability to multitask effectively.
	Preferably, a minimum of 1-3 years of leadership experience in a supermarket with leadership and supervisory experience will be an added advantage.
	Strong organizational and leadership skills, Experience in managing inventory, logistics, and daily operations
	Able to work independently with little or no supervision
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Passion for efficiency, structure, and continuous improvement
	Keen attention to detail.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: chuteltechnology@gmail.com with the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Online Presence Manager Job at Starzij Realtors




        
    

        
        Starzij Realtors is a real estate Investment advisory and asset management firm dedicated to helping investors and landlords make strategic, profitable, and data-driven property decisions. We specialize in acquisition support, portfolio optimization, rental analysis, and long-term asset performance.

We support clients across residential, commercial, and mixed-use assets ensuring every decision is backed by market intelligence, due diligence, and long-term value creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Online Presence Manager

Job Location: Abuja

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are hiring a creative and digital savvy Marketing & Online Presence Manager to lead our online visibility and brand growth.
	You will create engaging real estate content, manage our social media platforms, and drive consistent lead flow.


Key Responsibilities


	Create high quality video, photo and reel content for all social platforms
	Manage Instagram, tiktok, Facebook, Linkedin and youtube accounts.
	Grow brand presence, engagement and followers
	Manage the company's google my business profile and online reputation
	Design marketing materials (flyers, listing posts, and carousels)
	Analyze insights and optimize content strategy


Requirements


	Skilled in capcut, canva, meta business suite and modern content tools
	Experience creating engaging video contents
	Strong understanding of social media algorithms and trends
	Creative, organized, proactive and data-driven.
	Portfolio or links to previous work required.


Compensation


	Salary: Salary Range N150,000 - N200,000 / Month
	Performance Bonus
	Growth opportunities


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: starzijestate@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Include your instagram handle and portfolio link in your CV.
